intro1: Welcome to <proximo>PROXIMO</proximo>! This is your dashboard. It shows you your financial forecast. REMEMBER: <proximo>PROXIMO</proximo> is not connected to your banking account, nor does it run any real transactions on your behalf. <proximo>PROXIMO</proximo> is a simulation tool, it let's you simulate transactions that you can predict in the future. Click «Next« to look around.
